alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 9:33PM CST until February 25 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 26.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CST Wednesday was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.6 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 26.0 26.4 Wed 9 pm CST 25.3 24.2 22.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 930 AM CST.
